translations: v.释放；解除；使免除（free 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: adj. 无…的；摆脱…的；在…外面
adj. 无拘无束的；过分随便的；马虎的
没有义务的；没有牵连的
自由访问；自由存取；自由入口

sentences.sentence: The software uses artificial intelligence to grade student essays and short written answers, freeing professors for other tasks.
sentences.translation: 该软件使用人工智能来给学生的论文和简答题打分，从而将教授们解放出来以开展其他工作。

sentences.sentence: His deal with Disney will run out shortly, freeing him to pursue his own project.
sentences.translation: 他同迪斯尼的协议不久就将结束，这可以使他腾出手来从事自己的项目。

sentences.sentence: It can handle even the most complex graphic jobs, freeing up your computer for other tasks.
sentences.translation: 它甚至能处理最复杂的绘图事宜，使你的计算机腾出来完成其他任务。
